hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Could you give me some smaller notes? accutane makes acne worse at first A: "The Light in the Ruins" was a different kind of project, because it was dealing with a landscape I cherish. I've been going to this part of Tuscany every summer for 10 years. This landscape isn't the geography of my soul the way Armenia is, but in some ways it's the geography of my immediate family. So many of my favorite memories of my wife and my daughter come from this area. So in some ways when I was tearing it apart and showing the deprivations and the horror of war, I couldn't help but imagine what it must have been like for so many of the people I've met there in my years of visiting.
